attributes.action: Allow visitation at all care homes in England for close family or friends
attributes.additional_details: There are people in care homes around the country that won’t have had any visitors since March or April. They don’t all understand that a pandemic is happening and can be lonely, feel abandoned and confused, and perhaps don’t even remember who their family are anymore. Relatives/friends are missing out on months of time with these people, and it might be the last chance they have.
attributes.background: Allow a set number of people to visit care homes to see relatives or close friends, either inside or outside.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550381
